author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Physical iClickers
question: I noticed that my internet connection will sometimes drop when I use iClicker on my phone/laptop. This happened today during class and I wasn't able to answer one of the questions. If I bring a physical iClicker remote to class will it be compatible with iClicker Cloud?
student_answer: iClicker Cloud works with physical iClicker remotes, laptops, and mobile devices.
